entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Fog patches developing this evening. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 5 mm. High plus 3. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending in the evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022
